segments.source_content:
---
slug: /220
title: "This Week In React #220: Next.js, Astro, Nuqs, CRA, React Scan, Fumadocs, Fusion, Radix, Inertia | Sortables, Contributors Summit, Windows, Deep linking, Oklab, Audio, BottomTabs, Metro, OTA | TypeScript, Angular, Node.js, Vite"
authors: [slorber]
date: 02-05-2025
---
This week we have a good variety of React articles and Next.js is finally adding support for Node.js runtime middleware!

translations.ja: 今週はReactに関する様々な記事があり、Next.jsがついにNode.jsランタイムミドルウェアのサポートを追加しました！

segments.source_content: Mobile developers will also discover future plans for React Native, including desktop support from Microsoft. A new sortables drag & drop library should unlock new interactions in your app, considering it's quite hard to build all this yourself.

translations.ja: モバイル開発者向けには、Microsoftによるデスクトップサポートを含むReact Nativeの将来計画も紹介されています。新しいソータブルなドラッグ＆ドロップライブラリは、これを自力で実装するのが難しいため、アプリ内で新たなインタラクションを可能にするでしょう。

segments.source_content: TypeScript continues to progress with a new beta including a flag to support the newly added native Node.js support, and the upcoming browser support. A polyfill for native browser support is already available!

translations.ja: TypeScriptも進化を続けており、新たに追加されたネイティブNode.jsサポートと今後のブラウザサポートに対応するフラグを含む新しいベータ版がリリースされています。ネイティブブラウザサポートのためのポリフィルも既に利用可能です！

segments.source_content: I'm trying something new this week, splitting the newsletter title keywords with a `|`, following the pattern `React keywords | React Native keywords | Other keywords`. Do you think this is useful?

translations.ja: 今週は新しい試みとして、ニュースレターのタイトルキーワードを`|`で区切り、`Reactキーワード | React Nativeキーワード | その他のキーワード`というパターンにしてみました。これは役立つと思いますか？

segments.source_content: If your authentication isn't **helping you grow**, it's **holding you back**.

translations.ja: 認証が**成長を助けていない**なら、それは**足を引っ張っている**ということです。

segments.source_content: With [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan222024), you get everything you need to launch and scale your B2B product:

translations.ja: [PropelAuth](https://www.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan222024)を使えば、B2B製品の立ち上げと拡張に必要なすべてが手に入ります：

segments.source_content:
* **Easy to understand** [documentation](https://docs.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan222024) and **friendly, fast support**.
* **UIs that cover all your use cases** - signup, login, MFA, organization management and more.
* **User impersonation** so you can provide top-notch support to your users.
* **Enterprise SAML/SSO** and **advanced security features** so you can be upmarket-ready.
* **User insights** to help you strategize and expand.

translations.ja:
* **分かりやすい** [ドキュメント](https://docs.propelauth.com/?utm_source=newsletter\&utm_campaign=twinrjan222024)と**親切で迅速なサポート**
* **あらゆるユースケースに対応したUI** - サインアップ、ログイン、MFA、組織管理など
* ユーザーに最高のサポートを提供するための**ユーザー偽装機能**
* エンタープライズ向けの**SAML/SSO**と**高度なセキュリティ機能**
* 戦略立案と拡張を支援する**ユーザーインサイト**
[![Next.js PR - Node.jsミドルウェアのサポート](/emails/issues/220/nextjs-middleware.jpg)](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/75624)
**[Next.js PR - Node.jsミドルウェアのサポート](https://github.com/vercel/next.js/pull/75624)**

segments.source_content: A much-awaited feature for the Next.js community. The latest v15.2 canary has a new `experimental.nodeMiddleware` flag letting you opt-in for `runtime: ‘nodejs’`, enabling you to use Node.js APIs in middleware, and remove the constraints of being limited to APIs compatible with the edge runtime.

translations.ja: Next.jsコミュニティ待望の機能です。最新のv15.2 canaryには、`experimental.nodeMiddleware`フラグが追加され、`runtime: ‘nodejs’`を選択することで、ミドルウェア内でNode.js APIを使用できるようになり、エッジランタイムと互換性のあるAPIに制限されなくなります。

segments.source_content: Vercel middleware has also been [rebuilt from the ground up](https://x.com/galstar/status/1886832573482934706) to support multiple runtimes and run on [Fluid compute](https://vercel.com/blog/introducing-fluid-compute), a new cost-efficient way for Vercel to run serverless functions.

translations.ja: Vercelミドルウェアも[ゼロから再構築され](https://x.com/galstar/status/1886832573482934706)、複数のランタイムをサポートし、[Fluid compute](https://vercel.com/blog/introducing-fluid-compute)上で動作するようになりました。これは、Vercelがサーバーレス関数を実行するための新しいコスト効率の良い方法です。

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Add a collaborative document editor to your app](https://convex.link/0dtC5qE)
* 👀 [Remix PR - Split Route Modules](https://github.com/remix-run/react-router/pull/11871): Introduce new `future.unstable_splitRouteModules` flag so that the route component and its clientLoader can be downloaded in parallel instead of sequentially.
* 🗓️ [Paris TypeScript La Conf'](https://la-conf.typescript.paris/?utm_source=thisweekinreact) - 🇫🇷 Paris - 28 February - Last call to join the first ever TypeScript conference in the heart of Paris! Get 20% off tickets with code "TWIR"!
* 📖 [Integrate Motion with Radix](https://motion.dev/docs/radix): New docs page presenting integration examples for exit and layout animations.
* 📜 [Single Responsibility Principle in React: The Art of Component Focus](https://cekrem.github.io/posts/single-responsibility-principle-in-react/): I agree with this practice of designing your React app in “layers”.
* 📜 [Persisting Form Data in React: A Modern Approach with Nuqs](https://armand-salle.fr/post/persisting-form-data-in-react-a-modern-approach-with-nuqs/): Introduces a convenient lib to use search parameters in a typesafe way with integrations for Next.js and React Router.
* 📜 [Using Phoenix with React and Inertia](https://dnlytras.com/blog/phoenix-react-inertia): Explains the surprising technical choice of combining an Elixir/Phoenix backend with a React SPA, including the challenges encountered and caveats. The Inertia protocol permits stitching both technologies through an adapter.
* 📜 [An ast-grep rule to ban bad HTML nesting in React](https://macwright.com/2025/01/30/ast-grep-to-ban-bad-nesting): A possible alternative to ESLint rule.
* 📜 [How to Load Dynamic Stylesheets in React Router](https://sergiodxa.com/tutorials/load-dynamic-stylesheets-in-react-router): Presenting techniques to load custom styles per authenticated user/company, using resource routes and meta functions.
* 📜 [The React data-table I always wanted](https://www.openstatus.dev/blog/data-table-redesign): A full-featured demo of TanStack Table + shadcn/ui + Nuqs, documenting lessons learned. A good inspiration to build your own table.
* 📜 [How to inspect React Server Component Activity with Next.js](https://www.dash0.com/blog/how-to-inspect-react-server-component-activity-with-next-js): Using Next.js `instrumentation.js` and OpenTelemetry.
* 📜 [How to build a library in React](https://tigerabrodi.blog/how-to-build-a-library-in-react): Implementing and publishing a `useContextSelector` hook
* 📦 [Astro 5.2 - Tailwind 4 support, trailing slash redirects, option to disable React streaming](https://astro.build/blog/astro-520/): Streaming might be incompatible with runtime CSS-in-JS libraries.
* 📦 [mdx-prompt - Composable LLM Prompts with JSX](https://edspencer.net/2025/2/3/mdx-prompt-composable-prompts-with-jsx)
* 📦 [React Scan 0.1.2 - Re-render history, components tree](https://github.com/aidenybai/react-scan/releases/tag/v0.1.2)
* 📦 [Fumadocs 15.0 - Tailwind 4 support](https://fumadocs.vercel.app/blog/v15)
* 📦 [Redwood 8.5](https://github.com/redwoodjs/redwood/releases/tag/v8.5.0)
* 📦 [React Three XR 6.6 - IWER debugging tools for mixed reality apps](https://github.com/pmndrs/xr/releases/tag/v6.6.0)
* 📦 [MUI 7.0 alpha](https://github.com/mui/material-ui/releases/tag/v7.0.0-alpha.0)
* 🎥 [Aaron Francis - Introducing Fusion - Seamlessly combine React and Vue with Laravel](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=sa3XHjG1Kgs)
* 🎥 [Theo - Create React App is finally dead](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=aujVi7ipkfM)
* 🎥 [Jack Herrington - Stop Using Recoil, Use This Instead!](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=QepeuHTxiLo)
* 🎙️ [This Month in React 2025-01 - Movement on CRA, Redwood.js dead?](https://open.spotify.com/episode/45LTSjvCA5k5YAC7EM4ixk)

translations.ja: [![Sentryで何が壊れているのか、どこで発生しているのかを確認](/emails/issues/220/sentry.jpg)](https://sentry.io/resources/find-fix-test/?utm_source=bytes\&utm_medium=paid-community\&utm_campaign=general-fy25q4-evergreen\&utm_content=newsletter-biweeklydemo-register)

**[Sentryで何が壊れているのか、どこで発生しているのかを確認](https://sentry.io/resources/find-fix-test/?utm_source=bytes\&utm_medium=paid-community\&utm_campaign=general-fy25q4-evergreen\&utm_content=newsletter-biweeklydemo-register)**

segments.source_content: Sentry's new bi-weekly live demos will show you how to catch, fix and prevent issues fast. Join one of their engineers Thursdays at 1 PM ET for 25 minute tour—no slides, no fluff, just code-level visibility from pre-release to production. [RSVP](https://sentry.io/resources/find-fix-test/?utm_source=bytes\&utm_medium=paid-community\&utm_campaign=general-fy25q4-evergreen\&utm_content=newsletter-biweeklydemo-register)

translations.ja: Sentryの新しい隔週ライブデモでは、問題を迅速に捕捉、修正、防止する方法を紹介します。毎週木曜日午後1時（ET）にエンジニアによる25分間の実演に参加しましょう—スライドなし、余計なものなし、リリース前から本番環境までのコードレベルの可視性をそのままお見せします。[参加登録](https://sentry.io/resources/find-fix-test/?utm_source=bytes\&utm_medium=paid-community\&utm_campaign=general-fy25q4-evergreen\&utm_content=newsletter-biweeklydemo-register)

segments.source_content: A new powerful React Native library for re-ordering items with drag & drop gestures, including features such as:

translations.ja: ドラッグ＆ドロップジェスチャーでアイテムを並べ替えるための新しい強力なReact Nativeライブラリ。以下の機能を備えています:

segments.source_content:
* Support for Grid and Flex layouts
* Support for different item sizes, spacing, and arrangements
* Auto-scrolling when dragging outside screen
* Seamless layout animations
* Simple API, full TypeScript support
* Compatible with Expo and both architectures

translations.ja:
* グリッドとフレックスレイアウトのサポート
* 異なるアイテムサイズ、間隔、配置のサポート
* 画面外へのドラッグ時の自動スクロール
* シームレスなレイアウトアニメーション
* シンプルなAPI、完全なTypeScriptサポート
* Expoおよび両アーキテクチャとの互換性

segments.source_content:
* 💸 [Clerk - Build a daily workout tracker with Clerk, Convex, and Expo](https://go.clerk.com/scFbrAu)
* 📣 [Apple open-sourcing Swift Build engine](https://www.swift.org/blog/the-next-chapter-in-swift-build-technologies/)
* 💬 [React Native RFC - Oklab color space support](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/871)
* 📜 [React Native Core Contributor Summit 2024 Recap](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2025/02/03/react-native-core-contributor-summit-2024): Many contributors met last September before React Universe to discuss the future of React Native, including various topics such as the release process, the New Architecture, Lean Core 2.0, upcoming support for new Web APIs, and more.
* 📜 [Microsoft - A look into the new architecture on RNW 0.76 and 0.77](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/react-native/2025-01-29-new-architecture-on-0-76-0-77/): On Windows, the New Architecture is available in preview but isn’t enabled by default yet. Newly introduced features such as Modal support only support the New Architecture.
* 📜 [iOS Universal Links and Android App Links with Expo Router and EAS Hosting](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-and-app-links): Using web URLs for deep linking provides benefits over custom app scheme links. Easy to set up with Expo Router.
* 📜 [An elegantly simple DOM Component use case](https://expo.dev/blog/dom-component-use-case): Useful to quickly integrate fancy web things, such as D3 charts.
* 📜 [Using Live Activities in a React Native App](https://addjam.com/blog/2025-02-04/using-live-activities-react-native-app/)
* 📜 [Building a BottomSheet from scratch in React Native](https://reactiive.io/articles/bottom-sheet-animation)
* 📜 [Pre-built iOS Binaries: Reducing React Native Dev Start Time from Minutes to Seconds](https://www.monarchmoney.com/blog/pre-built-ios-binaries-reducing-react-native-dev-start-time-from-minutes-to)
* 📜 [Supporting iOS Share Extensions & Android Intents on React Native](https://www.devas.life/supporting-ios-share-extensions-android-intents-on-react-native/)
* 📦 [Audio API 0.4](https://github.com/software-mansion-labs/react-native-audio-api/releases/tag/0.4.0): Enables real-time waveform visualizations ([cool demo](https://x.com/sek_micha/status/1886814160735834540)).
* 📦 [Bottom Tabs 0.8.4 - Custom JS tabs](https://github.com/callstackincubator/react-native-bottom-tabs/releases/tag/react-native-bottom-tabs%400.8.4)
* 📦 [Skia 1.11 - Reconciler perf improvements](https://github.com/Shopify/react-native-skia/releases/tag/v1.11.0)
* 📦 [Metro 0.81.1 - Performance improvements and fixes](https://github.com/facebook/metro/releases/tag/v0.81.1)
* 📦 [Screens 4.6 - Important fixes](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.6.0)
* 📦 [Expo Open OTA - A Go implementation of the Expo Updates protocol, designed for production](https://axelmarciano.github.io/expo-open-ota/)
* 🎥 [Fernando Rojo - Major 2025 Updates: Mix Blend Mode, CSS Animations, SwiftUI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3V43hhMIUXE)
* 🎥 [Dan’s Lab - How to Create a Video Feed using Expo](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ym51mhxFvPQ)
* 🎙️ [RNR 320 - Silky Smooth Animations with Catlin Miron](https://www.reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-320-silky-smooth-animations)

translations.ja:
* 💸 [Clerk - Clerk、Convex、Expoを使った日々のワークアウトトラッカーの構築](https://go.clerk.com/scFbrAu)
* 📣 [AppleがSwift Buildエンジンをオープンソース化](https://www.swift.org/blog/the-next-chapter-in-swift-build-technologies/)
* 💬 [React Native RFC - Oklabカラースペースのサポート](https://github.com/react-native-community/discussions-and-proposals/pull/871)
* 📜 [React Nativeコアコントリビューターサミット2024の振り返り](https://reactnative.dev/blog/2025/02/03/react-native-core-contributor-summit-2024): 昨年9月、React Universeの前に多くのコントリビューターが集まり、リリースプロセス、New Architecture、Lean Core 2.0、新しいWeb APIのサポートなど、React Nativeの未来について議論しました。
* 📜 [Microsoft - RNW 0.76と0.77における新しいアーキテクチャの概要](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/react-native/2025-01-29-new-architecture-on-0-76-0-77/): Windowsでは、New Architectureがプレビューで利用可能ですが、デフォルトでは有効になっていません。Modalサポートなど新機能はNew Architectureのみに対応しています。
* 📜 [Expo RouterとEAS Hostingを使ったiOS Universal LinksとAndroid App Links](https://expo.dev/blog/universal-and-app-links): ウェブURLをディープリンクに使用すると、カスタムアプリスキームリンクよりも利点があります。Expo Routerで簡単に設定可能。
* 📜 [DOMコンポーネントのエレガントでシンプルな使用例](https://expo.dev/blog/dom-component-use-case): D3チャートなどの高度なウェブ機能を迅速に統合するのに便利です。
* 📜 [React NativeアプリでLive Activitiesを使用する](https://addjam.com/blog/2025-02-04/using-live-activities-react-native-app/)
* 📜 [React NativeでBottomSheetをスクラッチから構築](https://reactiive.io/articles/bottom-sheet-animation)
* 📜 [プリビルド済みiOSバイナリ: React Native開発の開始時間を数分から数秒に短縮](https://www.monarchmoney.com/blog/pre-built-ios-binaries-reducing-react-native-dev-start-time-from-minutes-to)
* 📜 [React NativeでiOS共有拡張とAndroidインテントをサポート](https://www.devas.life/supporting-ios-share-extensions-android-intents-on-react-native/)
* 📦 [Audio API 0.4](https://github.com/software-mansion-labs/react-native-audio-api/releases/tag/0.4.0): リアルタイムの波形ビジュアライゼーションを可能にします（[デモ](https://x.com/sek_micha/status/1886814160735834540)）。
* 📦 [Bottom Tabs 0.8.4 - カスタムJSタブ](https://github.com/callstackincubator/react-native-bottom-tabs/releases/tag/react-native-bottom-tabs%400.8.4)
* 📦 [Skia 1.11 - レコンシライアのパフォーマンス改善](https://github.com/Shopify/react-native-skia/releases/tag/v1.11.0)
* 📦 [Metro 0.81.1 - パフォーマンス改善と修正](https://github.com/facebook/metro/releases/tag/v0.81.1)
* 📦 [Screens 4.6 - 重要な修正](https://github.com/software-mansion/react-native-screens/releases/tag/4.6.0)
* 📦 [Expo Open OTA - 本番環境向けに設計されたExpo UpdatesプロトコルのGo実装](https://axelmarciano.github.io/expo-open-ota/)
* 🎥 [Fernando Rojo - 2025年の主要アップデート: Mix Blend Mode、CSSアニメーション、SwiftUI](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=3V43hhMIUXE)
* 🎥 [Dan’s Lab - Expoを使用したビデオフィードの作成方法](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ym51mhxFvPQ)
* 🎙️ [RNR 320 - Catlin Mironによるシルキースムースなアニメーション](https://www.reactnativeradio.com/episodes/rnr-320-silky-smooth-animations)

segments.source_content:
* 📜 [You should not use URLPattern to route HTTP requests on the server](https://adventures.nodeland.dev/archive/you-should-not-use-urlpattern-to-route-http/): The upcoming Node.js 23 URLPattern feature, based on regexp, is not scalable enough.
* 📜 [From Rust to TypeScript: A New Chapter for Prisma ORM](https://www.prisma.io/blog/from-rust-to-typescript-a-new-chapter-for-prisma-orm)
* 📦 [TypeScript 5.8 beta - `erasableSyntaxOnly`, require(esm), dependent return type narrowing](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-8-beta/)
* 📦 [ES Module Shims 2.0 - Polyfill for native ES module features](https://guybedford.com/es-module-shims-2.0): Already supports TC39 Type Annotations stripping, letting you run TypeScript code with `erasableSyntaxOnly` natively in the browser today, similar to Node.js!
* 📦 [Vite 6.1](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/blob/main/packages/vite/CHANGELOG.md#610-2025-02-05)
* 📦 [Mentoss - fetch() mocker for server/browser runtimes](https://humanwhocodes.com/blog/2025/01/introducing-mentoss-fetch-mocker/)
* 🎥 [Angular: The Documentary](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cRC9DlH45lA)

translations.ja:
* 📜 [サーバーでのHTTPリクエストのルーティングにURLPatternを使うべきではない](https://adventures.nodeland.dev/archive/you-should-not-use-urlpattern-to-route-http/): 近々リリースされるNode.js 23のURLPattern機能は正規表現ベースであり、スケーラビリティに欠けます。
* 📜 [RustからTypeScriptへ: Prisma ORMの新たな章](https://www.prisma.io/blog/from-rust-to-typescript-a-new-chapter-for-prisma-orm)
* 📦 [TypeScript 5.8 beta - `erasableSyntaxOnly`、require(esm)、依存型の絞り込み](https://devblogs.microsoft.com/typescript/announcing-typescript-5-8-beta/)
* 📦 [ES Module Shims 2.0 - ネイティブESモジュール機能のポリフィル](https://guybedford.com/es-module-shims-2.0): 既にTC39 Type Annotationsの削除をサポートしており、Node.jsと同様に`erasableSyntaxOnly`を使用してブラウザ上でTypeScriptコードを直接実行可能です！
* 📦 [Vite 6.1](https://github.com/vitejs/vite/blob/main/packages/vite/CHANGELOG.md#610-2025-02-05)
* 📦 [Mentoss - サーバー/ブラウザランタイム向けfetch()モッカー](https://humanwhocodes.com/blog/2025/01/introducing-mentoss-fetch-mocker/)
* 🎥 [Angular: The Documentary](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=cRC9DlH45lA)
